data.message: @Facebook Im being harrass, threatening and bullying by a group created not a while ago.  I have reported such incident to group's administration,  however,  no action has been taken on this matter. This group needs to be close immediately because im not the only victim of bullying. This group contributes to hate speech,  racism and many other things so please act now before anyone gets hurt. It's a serious situation and it cannot continue to happen.
